roleset.name: toward the beginning portion of a time period
roleset.note: EARLY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7, comparison to late.01. (from early.01-j)

role.descr: what is at the beginning of the time period

example.name: arg1, CXN
example.text: On top of that , the reform which Bashar has committed to and has already begun to carry out , lets the Syrian public to have seen the hope for new life and has eased to a certain degree their contradiction with the government , so it 's still too early to predict that a civil war will occur in Syria .
example.arg: [too] [to predict that a civil war will occur in Syria]

example.name: both args
example.text: It was early in the fall and a blowin' up a squall

roleset.name: arriving before the appointed/expected time
roleset.note: EARLY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7, comparison to 'late.02'. (from early.02-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: Kmart, for instance, was early to the self-checkout aisle trend...
